data: Bowel Protocol - Surgical (Module)
Medications

This is a general surgery bowel protocol that replaces the following bowel protocols: ENT, THORACICS, VASCULAR, ORTHOPEDICS RECONSTRUCTIVE SURGERY, ORTHO TRAUMA, UROLOGY. It does not include specialized surgical bowel protocols such as NEURO/NSURG Bowel Protocol (Module), PLASURG Bowel Protocol (Module), TRAUMA Bowel Protocol (Module), ORTHO Bowel Protocol - Fractured Hip (Module)

CONTRAINDICATIONS: Complete bowel obstruction, diarrhea, ileostomy, short bowel syndrome, esophagectomy patients
Following bowel surgery, Provider to review existing orders and discontinue stimulant laxatives. Stimulants contraindicated following bowel surgery
Communication Order
Initiate protocol once patient passing flatus and/or ileus clinically resolved
